message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for both of us, especially considering the inflation!
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair. Let's be reasonable, I'll take $55 and you can have $45.  This accounts for the inflation hitting you harder than me.

Bob, let's be practical. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is the same split you offered me last round, but the inflation means it's actually better for you now and worse for me. It's time to be fair and settle this.
